statements: SELECT * FROM nft_index
SELECT nft_id, name, category FROM nft_index WHERE category = 'Art'
SELECT name, description FROM nft_index WHERE nft_id = 3
SELECT * FROM nft_index WHERE nft_id IN (1, 4, 5)
SELECT category, image_url FROM nft_index ORDER BY nft_id DESC
SELECT * FROM nft_index WHERE nft_id = 1;
SELECT name, category FROM nft_index WHERE category = 'Art' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT nft_id, description FROM nft_index WHERE category = 'Game' OR category = 'Anime' LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM nft_index WHERE category = 'Music';
SELECT nft_id, name, description, image_url FROM nft_index WHERE nft_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM nft_categories;
SELECT category_name FROM nft_categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM nft_items ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, category_name FROM nft_items JOIN nft_categories ON nft_items.category_id = nft_categories.category_id;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS num_items FROM nft_categories JOIN nft_items ON nft_categories.category_id = nft_items.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT * FROM nft_categories;
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM nft_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT nft_categories.category_id, nft_categories.category_name, nft_items.item_name FROM nft_categories JOIN nft_items ON nft_categories.category_id = nft_items.category_id;
SELECT item_name, category_name FROM nft_items JOIN nft_categories ON nft_items.category_id = nft_categories.category_id WHERE item_id > 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM nft_items WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM NFTs
SELECT id, name, owner FROM NFTs
SELECT name, category FROM NFTs WHERE owner='Alice'
SELECT * FROM Categories WHERE id=1
SELECT name, description FROM Categories ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT id, name, owner, category FROM NFTs;
SELECT * FROM NFTs WHERE owner='Alice';
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM NFTs GROUP BY category;
SELECT NFTs.name, Categories.name AS category_name FROM NFTs JOIN NFTCategories ON NFTs.id = NFTCategories.nft_id JOIN Categories ON NFTCategories.category_id = Categories.id;
SELECT owner, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM NFTs GROUP BY owner HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM nft_categories;
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM nft_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM nft_items WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT item_name FROM nft_items WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT owner_name FROM nft_owners INNER JOIN nft_ownership ON nft_owners.owner_id = nft_ownership.owner_id WHERE item_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM nft_categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, category_name FROM nft_items JOIN nft_categories ON nft_items.category_id = nft_categories.category_id;

SELECT o.owner_name, i.item_name, c.category_name FROM nft_owners o JOIN nft_ownership ow ON o.owner_id = ow.owner_id JOIN nft_items i ON i.item_id = ow.item_id JOIN nft_categories c ON i.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT * FROM nft_ownership WHERE ownership_id < 1000 ORDER BY ownership_id DESC;
SELECT owner_id, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM nft_ownership GROUP BY owner_id HAVING COUNT(item_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM NFTs;
SELECT id, name, category FROM NFTs WHERE creator = 'Alice';
SELECT id, name, created_at FROM NFTs ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM NFTCategories WHERE category_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT nft_id, owner_id FROM NFTOwners WHERE nft_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, name, category, creator, created_at FROM NFTs;
SELECT * FROM NFTs WHERE creator = 'John Doe' OR category = 'Digital Art';
SELECT name, category, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM NFTs GROUP BY name, category;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM NFTs ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT * FROM NFTs INNER JOIN NFTHistory ON NFTs.id = NFTHistory.nft_id WHERE action = 'purchase' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
